headline: CMS Energy Declares Quarterly Dividend on Cumulative Redeemable Perpetual Preferred Stock
summary: The Board of Directors of CMS Energy has declared a dividend on the 4.200% Cumulative Redeemable Perpetual Preferred Stock, Series C of the Corporation.

raw.headline: CMS Energy Declares Quarterly Dividend on Cumulative Redeemable Perpetual Preferred Stock
raw.summary: The Board of Directors of CMS Energy has declared a dividend on the 4.200% Cumulative Redeemable Perpetual Preferred Stock, Series C of the Corporation.

headline: Consumers Energy, the Principal Subsidiary of CMS Energy, Declares Quarterly Dividend on Preferred Stock
summary: The Board of Directors of Consumers Energy, the principal subsidiary of CMS Energy, has declared a quarterly dividend on the Utility's preferred stock.

raw.headline: Consumers Energy, the Principal Subsidiary of CMS Energy, Declares Quarterly Dividend on Preferred Stock
raw.summary: The Board of Directors of Consumers Energy, the principal subsidiary of CMS Energy, has declared a quarterly dividend on the Utility's preferred stock.

headline: Energy Chief Says US Won’t Move Forward With With Billions in Biden-Era Loans
summary: (Bloomberg) -- Energy Secretary Chris Wright said his agency doesn’t plan to move forward with billions of dollars worth of Biden-era loans as the Trump administration reviews the department’s $400 billion-strong green bank.
